name: Annette K. SCHWARTZ and Joseph Schwartz, h/w, Petitioners v. Selena GRIFFIN and Lisa Ann Bannister a/k/a Lisa Ann Bannister-Johnson a/k/a Lisa Ann Johnson, Respondents

parties: Annette K. SCHWARTZ and Joseph Schwartz, h/w, Petitioners v. Selena GRIFFIN and Lisa Ann Bannister a/k/a Lisa Ann Bannister-Johnson a/k/a Lisa Ann Johnson, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 27th day of February, 2008, the Application for Relief and the Application for Relief Under Rule Pa. R.A.P. 123 to Docket and Determine this Matter as a Petition for Allowance of Appeal are DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
942 A.2d 896
Annette K. SCHWARTZ and Joseph Schwartz, h/w, Petitioners v. Selena GRIFFIN and Lisa Ann Bannister a/k/a Lisa Ann Bannister-Johnson a/k/a Lisa Ann Johnson, Respondents.
No. 90 EM 2006.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Feb. 27, 2008.
